Class EnvironmentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.connectlife.coreserver.modules.environment.EnvironmentManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiscoveryListner, Module

    public class EnvironmentManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module, DiscoveryListner
    Manager of the environment of the automation.
    Author:
    ericpinet
    2015-09-09
